other_tests.findings: QT prolongation (QTm 600 ms, QTc 577 ms) and preexcitation with a delta wave.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-ablation ECG showed no delta wave; however, QT prolongation was still present (QTm 640 ms, QTc 604 ms).

other_tests.findings: Polymorphic ventricular tachycardia (torsade de pointes) with a duration of 50 s, self-terminating.
Successful treatment of the left inferoposterior accessory pathway.
